name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Ralph C. FEGLEY, Jr., Appellant

ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.

casebody.head_matter:
440 A.2d 1191
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, v. Ralph C. FEGLEY, Jr., Appellant.
